segments.text: Yes , this is the tenant of apartment ten . I guess my kitchen sink is clogging up again , and so is the bathtub .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alright . I'll send someone over tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Um , I'd really appreciate it if you send someone over to fix it today . It's really a bother . I can't cook or take a shower .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine , I'll be up in a few minutes .
segments.speaker: S2
